__comment: This file contains overrides for Microsoft Entra role definitions. It affects some info displayed on https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/identity/role-based-access-control/permissions-reference VS what is retrieved through supporting Microsoft Graph APIs.

documentation.excludedRoles: Roles to exclude from the documentation, with reasons for exclusion
documentation.manualRoles: (NOT HANDLED) Additional roles and their permissions to include in the documentation. These roles aren't available through Microsoft Graph APIs. Format the JSON object to match the API response format and avoid breaking the script.
documentation.typos: (NOT HANDLED) Common typos to fix in the documentation.

roleDisplayNames.Azure AD Joined Device Local Administrat: Microsoft Entra Joined Device Local Administrator

roleDescriptions.Can manage Azure DevOps organization pol: Can manage Azure DevOps policies and settings.
roleDescriptions.Can manage all aspects of the Cloud App: Can manage all aspects of the Defender for Cloud Apps product.
Can manage all aspects of the Fabric and Power BI products.
roleDescriptions.Create and manage all aspects of Global: Create and manage all aspects of Microsoft Entra Internet Access and Microsoft Entra Private Access, including managing access to public and private endpoints.
roleDescriptions.Can manage Active Directory to Microsoft: Manage Active Directory to Microsoft Entra cloud provisioning, Microsoft Entra Connect, pass-through authentication (PTA), password hash synchronization (PHS), seamless single sign-on (seamless SSO), and federation settings. Does not have access to manage Microsoft Entra Connect Health.
roleDescriptions.Can view and share dashboards and insigh: Can view and share dashboards and insights via the Microsoft 365 Insights app.
roleDescriptions.Has access to topic management dashboard: Can organize, create, manage, and promote topics and knowledge.
roleDescriptions.Manage all aspects of Entra Permissions: Manage all aspects of Microsoft Entra Permissions Management.
roleDescriptions.Can create and manage all aspects of Mic: Can create and manage all aspects of Microsoft Dynamics 365, Power Apps and Power Automate.
roleDescriptions.Can see only tenant level aggregates in: Read Usage reports and Adoption Score, but can't access user details.

resourceActionDescriptions.Manage all aspects of Entra Network Acce: Manage all aspects of Microsoft Entra Network Access
resourceActionDescriptions.Read all aspects of Entra Network Access: Read all aspects of Microsoft Entra Network Access
resourceActionDescriptions.Manage all aspects of Entra Permissions: Manage all aspects of Microsoft Entra Permissions Management
resourceActionDescriptions.Read all aspects of Entra Permissions Ma: Read all aspects of Microsoft Entra Permissions Management
resourceActionDescriptions.Manage all aspects of Power BI: Manage all aspects of Fabric and Power BI
resourceActionDescriptions.Create and delete all resources, and rea: Create and delete all resources, and read and update standard properties in Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps
resourceActionDescriptions.Read and manage objects to enable on-pre: Read standard on-premises directory synchronization information
resourceActionDescriptions.Manage all restore points associated wit: Manage all restore points associated with selected SharePoint sites in Microsoft 365 Backup
Manage all restore points associated with selected OneDrive accounts in Microsoft 365 Backup

excludedRoles.reason: Used by Microsoft Entra Connect Sync Account (On Premises Directory Sync Account)
Deprecated - Do not use (Workplace Device Join)

manualRoles.description: Can manage commercial purchases for a company, department or team.
Do not use - not intended for general use.
